Key Match Events: Jack Grealish scored the opening goal in the 18th minute
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a free kick in the 74th minute
Declan Rice scored in the 84th minute
Pre-Game Insights: England made six changes from the shambolic 2-1 defeat by Greece
England returned to a more conventional formation
Post-Match Reflections: Jack Grealish expressed happiness with the win and the team's performance
Declan Rice discussed his goal and the team's dominance in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are second in Group B2 with nine points after four games
Finland are bottom without a point
Others: England's interim manager Lee Carsley faced scrutiny after the loss to Greece
Finland will regret missing chances when England led 1-0
